name: Himezawa: Japan Debut!
blurb: Help international performance artist Himezawa reach her dream goal: Performing in Japan!

name: FATLiP Adversity Council: Help Us Get LBS To The Yard!
blurb: Out of 450 applications, we were selected to be part of The Yard's NOW '15 Festival. We can't afford to get there. Can you help?

name: The Incredible Science Machine
blurb: The most famous chain reaction and domino builders in America collaborate to create one of the largest chain reactions in history

name: The 9th Ward Improv Opera
blurb: In remembrance of Katrina's 10th Anniversary, New Orleans residents express a story of renewal through music, dance, & spoken word.

name: The Resonance Podcast - A Sci-fi Audio Series
blurb: A fictional audio-play series to be released in podcast form. Full of adventure and action, these stories are for anyone on-the-go.

name: Equilibrium Rites
blurb: A 100 mile walk amongst 80 billion bees as they are trucked in to pollinate California's almond orchards. Art. Ritual. Ecology.

name: Odyssey Works: Six Proposals for a More Beautiful World
blurb: A radically new approach to art and performance based on nearly 15 years of performances for one-person audiences.

name: Laji: Indigenous Oral Poetry from the Philippines
blurb: Preserving the vanishing art of indigenous poetry in Batanes, Philippines.

name: Cardistry-Con 2016
blurb: Global Cardistry Meetup.  Join us July 8-10 in Berlin, Germany.

name: Woman of Her Words
blurb: Uniting classic poetry with modern performance art to serve as a conduit for healing, empowerment, visibility and change.

name: Maybe Capital
blurb: Dre and Anya have created the first satirical board game to poke a little fun at Silicon Valley. You're invited to join in the fun!

name: Say Something Bunny!
blurb: An immersive performance based on an unforgettable amateur audio recording made over 60 years ago. Be among the first to see it live.

name: Honour Choir 2018 Anniversary of World War 1
blurb: This project will fund the creation of new art, specifically music and spoken word, for the commemoration of the end of WW1.

name: We're All Going To Die - The Festival
blurb: We're All Going To Die is a festival that asks us to 'Fear Less. Live More.' Because we're all going to die anyway right?

name: 100 HEARTS | VALENTINE ANGELS | ALL SYSTEMS LOVE
blurb: Make 100 Hearts and deliver to those who have recently lost a loved one on Valentine's Day w/ Mels ❤️ Land: All Systems Love

name: Drag King History Website
blurb: A website dedicated to an extensive Drag King and Male Impersonator history starting with Part 1: Tang Dynasty in China to 1972.

name: World's Smallest Post Service: A Magical Future
blurb: Make magic with us at the World's Smallest Post Service. Help us open a brick & mortar storefront and spiffy up our online experience!

name: Goodday Bikes + Curiosity Bags
blurb: A place to commision an artistic, handmade, custom bicycle and bag system.

name: Deluxe Linking Rings by Michael Ammar and TCC
blurb: Probably the best, most affordable 12 inch Linking Rings you will ever see.

name: Artisan Coin Series by TCC
blurb: By Coin Magician, for Coin Magicians. Focus on presenting the world's coolest and highest quality coin gaffs and accessories.

name: CryptoArt RPG: Week I: [Master Studies]
blurb: A Game for Artists, and their Fans, which provides training & rewards in the form of weekly learning challenges.

name: Supporting James Chan - Magician and Juggler
blurb: All funds will be used to invest in tutorials and lessons for James Chan to further his studies in the performing arts.

name: Magician's Table and Magician's Organizer By TCC PRESENTS
blurb: Two Exquisite 「Devices」 dedicated to All Magicians.

name: Untrammelled by Wonder House & TCC
blurb: A Stunning Tribute to the Classic Ball and Vase.

name: GRL PWR Presents SWEAT!
blurb: An annual, gender-expansive drag show

name: The Faraday Pad by Infinity
blurb: A remarkable secret hidden in tiny space.  The possibilities are only limited by your imagination.

name: PITATA Season III: PITATA Pendulum Sharpie & Smart Scale
blurb: Be Creative, Be Innovative. PITATA Season III will be one of the Best Magic & Tech products you have ever seen.

name: Artisan Coin New Series by TCC Magic
blurb:
Refreshed Classic Coin Magic Apparatus, and More.
The Tunnel, Mbox, Barallel Vase, Anything to Lighter.

name: Kirin Dice, Mayan Dice Box, Three Body Game by CLASSICHO
blurb: Classical with Echo: CLASSICHO focuses on the classical beauty of magic.

name: Shoonya: ClimArts Showcase of Dance and Design
blurb:
Support London based dancers to promote awareness of climate change using art and design at the
London Design Festival

name: PITATA Watch & Smart Memopad & Palm Peeker
blurb: PITATA's Annual Project, 3 Products in total. This will be one of the best Magic & Tech Products you have ever seen.
